channel.title: *got a model..where do i put the ints?*
channel.description:
ok, so i downloaded a model from another section in the fourms, if you want to see it it looks like this:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342445.0.html
i downloaded it, extracted the RAR files into my models folder into my client..but what do i do with the ints? :( please help me?
EDIT: YES I DID USED THE SEARCH BAR!!!! but didn't help me..so plz help?

item.title: *got a model..where do i put the ints?*
item.dc:creator: @ModAssassin ModAssassin
item.description:
@ModAssassin wrote:

[quote=“Michaelmmm, post:2, topic:282444”]what u do is, download the models and put them into the “model” folder then u open up “Class 8” in ur client folder and then scroll down till u see similar INTS and add in urs.

then compile the client and run the server then log in type: (EXACT WORDS)

add model #####
(the numbers are in the ints, NOTE: this is a client command so no need for ::add model ####
just add_model_####

EX:
}
if(i == 13964)
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Equip”; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want
class8.anInt174 = 11111; // Drop/Inv Model
class8.anInt165 = 11111; // Male Wield Model
class8.anInt200 = 11111; // Female Wield
class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used)
class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used)
class8.anInt181 = 400; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller
class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards
class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right
class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right
class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up
class8.aString170 = “Owners Cape”; // Item Name
class8.aByteArray178 = “The owners cape that can only be worn by amazing people.”.getBytes(); // Item Examine
}

you would put in this int and type add model 11111 and so on…[/quote]

thank you SO MUCH!!! i luv u 4 this wud rep++ u if i cud!

Read full topic
item.source: *got a model..where do i put the ints?*

item.title: *got a model..where do i put the ints?*
item.dc:creator: @Michaelmmm Michaelmmm
item.description:
@Michaelmmm wrote:

what u do is, download the models and put them into the “model” folder then u open up “Class 8” in ur client folder and then scroll down till u see similar INTS and add in urs.

then compile the client and run the server then log in type: (EXACT WORDS)

add model #####
(the numbers are in the ints, NOTE: this is a client command so no need for ::add model ####
just add_model_####

EX:
}
if(i == 13964)
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Equip”; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want
class8.anInt174 = 11111; // Drop/Inv Model
class8.anInt165 = 11111; // Male Wield Model
class8.anInt200 = 11111; // Female Wield
class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used)
class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used)
class8.anInt181 = 400; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller
class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards
class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right
class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right
class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up
class8.aString170 = “Owners Cape”; // Item Name
class8.aByteArray178 = “The owners cape that can only be worn by amazing people.”.getBytes(); // Item Examine
}

you would put in this int and type add model 11111 and so on…

Read full topic
